Introduction

PLAVE (Korean: 플레이브; Japanese: プレイブ) is a virtual five-member boy group under VLAST. They made their debut on March 12, 2023 with their single album "Asterum".

Their name is a combination of the words "Play" and "Rêve" and means that they are creating a new world to achieve their dreams.

The name of the fandom, PLLI, is a combination of "Play" and "Reality", which means being able to be together in reality.
